name: Worldcup slackbot
description: A bot for slack to message about matches of the 2018 FIFA World Cup

SLACK_WEBHOOK.description: The slack webhook url, the default will not work, you need to get this from slack when creating the webhook

FOOTBALL_DATA_API_TOKEN.description: The Api token used to get the match data, the default will not work, you need to get this from the Api page

HIGHLIGHTED_TEAM.description: A team to highligh (bold) in the posted message, it should match the team name that comes from the Api

SHOW_ZONES_JSON.description: A key-value object that represent the available timezones where the match time will be shown, the key could be anything (preferably a timezone name), the value should be the integer offset hours of the timezone

CRON_SCHEDULE.description: The cron expression to schedule each Api check. The default is every 15 minutes.

SLACK_ENABLED.description: Enable or disable the post to slack

SLACK_CHANNEL.description: The name of the slack channel (this should match slack webhook config) that the bot will post to

SLACK_BOT.description: The name of the bot (this should match slack webhook config) that will make the post

LOG_LEVEL.description: The log level to the console (error, info, debug, silly)

ENABLE_STATIC_WEB.description: Enable a static web server that serves logs.
